channel.title: Android on juri.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Android on juri.dev

item.title: HTML5 vs Android: Apps or Web for mobile development??
item.description: This is a hotly discussed topic recently. The web is now a fully-capable platform and it's getting better and better as the HTML5 standard advances.

item.title: Should Android Worry About the iOS 5 Update? Definitely Not!
item.description: With the announcement of the new iOS 5 at the WWDC, the first articles emerge already on the web relating the new features with the existing Android OS.
